00028 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlAccountDelete::CurlAccountDelete()
00029                                           :CurlSubmitForm(){
00030 
00031   GlobalURI g;
00032 
00033   xml=new xmlAccountList();
00034   this->filename=g.getAdminAdress("deleteplayer.php");;
00035   // Setting the posted data key values
00036   postedData.addKey("name");
00037 
00038 }

00040 
00044 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlAccountDelete::~CurlAccountDelete(){
00045   xml->~xmlAccountList();
00046   xml=NULL;
00047 }
00048 
00055 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlAccountDelete::controlBefore(){
00056   bool ret=true;
00057 
00058   const char* name=postedData.getValue("name");
00059   const char* errmsg;
00060 
00061   // The name is empty
00062   if (strlen(name)==0){
00063     errmsg="The player's name is empty";
00064     setCustomErrorMessage(errmsg);
00065     LOGW(errmsg);
00066     ret=false;
00067   }
00068 
00069 
00070 
00071   // The player does not exists
00072   if (!xml->isAccountExisting(name)){
00073     errmsg="The player does not exists";
00074     setCustomErrorMessage(errmsg);
00075     LOGW(errmsg);
00076 
00077     ret=false;
00078 
00079   }
00080 
00081   return ret;
00082 }
00083 
00089 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlAccountDelete::controlAfter(){
00090   xml->refresh();
00091   bool ret=true;
00092   const char* errmsg;
00093 
00094   // Get the values
00095   const char* name=postedData.getValue("name");
00096 
00097   tAccountListItem *it=xml->getAccount(name);
00098 
00099   if (it){
00100     errmsg="The player exists";
00101     setCustomErrorMessage(errmsg);
00102     LOGW(errmsg);
00103     ret=false;
00104   }
00105 
00106 
00107   return ret;
00108 }

00115 void RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlAccountDelete::setName(const char* c){
00116   this->setPostedData("name", c);

00118 }
